ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Special Switch Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Special Switch') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed'), RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, OR( ISBLANK(ContactId) , ISBLANK(NS_OperationsManagementContact__c) , ISBLANK( NS_Equipment__c ), ISPICKVAL( NS_AncillaryChargesProtected__c,'') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Contact Name, Operations Management Contact, Equipment Number(s) and check Ancillary Charges Protected prior to closing the Case.
